dcterms:creator: F. Koto
A. Rahimi
J.H. Lau
T. Baldwin
dcterms:description: A dataset containing intent classification for small talk conversations with chatbots in Indonesian. The language used is informal and the data is imbalanced. Example of classes: askJokes, askTime, greetings, askWeather, etc.
dcterms:title: Smltk

dcterms:creator: F. Koto
A. Rahimi
J.H. Lau
T. Baldwin
dcterms:description: A text classification dataset for an online medical consultant. It contains conversation between doctor and patient which grouped into complaint, patient’s actions, diagnosis, recommendation, and fallback.
dcterms:title: Health

dcterms:creator: F. Koto
A. Rahimi
J.H. Lau
T. Baldwin
dcterms:description: A semi-formal classification dataset for questions and tasks that can be answered automatically by a telecommunication’s bot. Example of the classes: ask promo, error network, postpaid registration, 4G activation, etc.
dcterms:title: Telco

dcterms:creator: F. Koto
A. Rahimi
J.H. Lau
T. Baldwin
dcterms:description: A binary classification sentiment analysis dataset that contains text from Twitter and hotel review, obtained from IndoLEM.
dcterms:title: SentA

dcterms:creator: A. Purwarianti
I.A.P.A. Crisdayanti
dcterms:description: A sentiment analysis dataset that is grouped into three classes: positive, negative, and neutral. It contains comments and reviews from various Indonesian online platforms.
dcterms:title: SMSA

dcterms:creator: M.S. Saputri
R. Mahendra
M. Adriani
dcterms:description: A Twitter emotion classification dataset that was grouped into 5 classes: anger, fear, happiness, love, and sadness.
dcterms:title: EmoT

dcterms:creator: D. Hoesen
A. Purwarianti
dcterms:description: A manually gathered and annotated NER dataset that contains fourteen different labels: person, location, email, number, phone, date-time, currency, and 5 different units.
dcterms:title: EntK

dcterms:creator: J. Fernando
M.L. Khodra
A.A. Septiandri
dcterms:description: An aspect and opinion term extraction dataset from a hotel aggregator platform, AiryRooms, that contains sentiment for each aspect.
dcterms:title: TermA

dcterms:creator: A. Dinakaramani
F. Rashel
A. Luthfi
R. Manurung
dcterms:description: POS Tagging dataset that was collected from PAN Localization Project. The dataset is used for part-of-speech tagging.
dcterms:title: POS

dcterms:creator: D. Hoesen
A. Purwarianti
dcterms:description: A NER dataset from Grit-ID repository. The tags are person, location, organization in IOB format.
dcterms:title: NERGrit

dcterms:creator: D. Hoesen
A. Purwarianti
dcterms:description: A NER dataset containing articles from several Indonesian news websites. The tags are PER (person), LOC (location), IND (product or brand), EVT (event), FNB (food and beverages) in its IOB format.
dcterms:title: NERP

dcterms:creator: D. Hoesen
A. Purwarianti
dcterms:description: A POS Tagging dataset with the same data as NERP. It contains 26 POS tag classes that follows Indonesian Association of Computational Linguistics (INACL).
dcterms:title: POSP
